title: tests not running in Clean-room environment

body:
Fixed by changing 
`let instance = await Library.deployed();`
to:
`let instance = await Library.new();`

Hi @Psykepro, the clean-room environment is only reset [inbetween each `contract(...)`](https://www.trufflesuite.com/docs/truffle/testing/writing-tests-in-javascript#use-contract-instead-of-describe-), not between each `it(...`).  So, that's why you're not seeing clean-room behavior here; if you change these to separate `contract(...)`s, it will work.

(Another solution, as you noted, is to use `Library.new()` rather than `Library.deployed()`, although I don't know if this will work in all situations.)

Does that solve your problem, or are there further issues here?  Thanks!
